p:
PAGE-ICE (v6.22) is based on the PAGE09 IAM
19, 20 . It includes several updates both to climate science and economics from IPCC AR5 and literature that followed, as well as several novel developments presented in this paper. The updates are summarised below, with the full technical description provided in Supplementary Note 1, Supplementary Figs 18– 23 and Supplementary Tables 7– 17.
